report.title: Too Mild for My Tolerance
report.author: sixthseal
report.bodytext:
/n is also known as /n a.k.a /n, an opiate agonist used for moderate to severe pain, with an equivalency of 7.5 mg of pethidine to 1 mg of morphine in parenteral administration. Pethidine/meperidine has a duration of 2 hours so it's a pretty short acting opioid. I was out doctor shopping the whole of last night and didn't get a hit out of the five medical establishments I went to. I guess six is my lucky number coz I managed to get a pethidine IM injection from it. =D /n /n [photo no longer available] /n /n This is /n made by /n (Malaysia). I have never tried pethidine IM injection so imagine my glee as I made this happen. ,) /n /n /nYou were here for DF-118 last time right? The medical record says you have a bad back. /n /nI actually had a slipped disc (actually, I don't ,)) and it slipped again for the second time. /n (makes 'ouch face', grimaces and made as if my spinal cord was killing me) /n /nDo we have DF-118 here? (talking to nurse) /n /n(after rummaging through the restricted access medication cabinet, they don't have it, I know that coz I've been here before) No we don't, but we have Voltaren. /n /nDo you want something else? I can give you another pain-killer. /n /n(Hell no! It's opiates or nothing) Doctor, I hope you can help coz I'm in a lot of pain right now. Can you write a script or something? /n /nOkay, do you have a medical history of your slipped disc? /n /nYeah, I had an MRI and X-Ray done in KL, where it happened (which didn't happen, of course ,)) and the prognosis was a slipped disc, which I slipped again just now (*grimace of pain*) /n /nDo you have it with you? /n /nNo, I'm sorry doctor, I left the medical documents in KL... /n /nOkay, well since you have a prior here, I'll script you. Is there anything else? /n /n(pushing my luck, deciding to go for gold) Hey, I know this is a strange question, but I'm in a lot of pain right now, do you have anything to help me get through tonight? Can you give me a morphine shot? (Prays to God he doesn't go amok) /n /nMorphine...hmm...well, we do have morphine but we don't give it to outpatients. I think we have pethidine though, do you want that? /n /nIs pethidine an opiate? (Knowing full well it is, but no harm in playing the dumb patient) /n /nYes it is. /n (Writes /n on my medical record) /n /n(looks) (tries not to grin) (tries not to grin again, perhaps somewhat unsuccessfully) Thank you very much doctor. /n /nAlright, just lie there and I'll prep the shot. /n /n(puts on a show of painful lying down and bolts straight up, apparently with a good back again) Hey, I'm sorry doctor, another unusual request, can I take a photo of the pethidine vial? /n /nWhy? /n /nIt's just an interest of mine. (starts photoshoot of the IM pethidine 50 mg snap off ampoule) Thanks doctor. /n /nOkay, I'm going to inject you now. Turn over. /n /nEr...can I take the IM injection in my arm? (I don't want the doctor to see my thigh, which is the best place to bang shit if you're holding down a professional job - full of scar marks and bruises from injections - he would have known for sure I'm an IDU - Injecting Drug User). /n /n(Grips my arm) Seems to be okay here. /n /n(starts filming the procedure) /n /n [photo no longer available] /n /n /n /n /nIs it in? Pethidine 50 mg? /n /nMmm... /n /nOkay, IM, sixthseal.com (Jesus Christ, I should not have said that in the video but it just slipped out). /n (sounds of pethidine injection process) /n /nYeah, that's the place. /n /nHmm...why do you have some bruises here? /n (OMG those are my IM injection spots when I was injecting ketamine) /n /nEr...uh...they're some just bruises, ya know. I probably hit something. /n (Quickly changes subject) /n /nSo, is that pethidine 50 mg? /n /nYeah. /n /nThanks. /n [video no longer available] /n /n /nAre you driving? /n /nEr...no. (actually I am) /n /nThis will cause the usual opiate side effects, drowsiness etc. so be careful. /n /nI will, my friend is just outside (actually no one is outside, I don't take friends on doctor shopping expedition after a disastrous incident where I lost a good doctor coz me and my friend was stoned and high on meth and she had a laughing fit). /n /nOkay, here is your script. You're not a drug addict are you? /n /n(*coughs and nearly chokes*) Of course I'm not. I hate drugs. ,) (I didn't wink, I'm just winking on the blog) /n /nGood. /n /n /n /n /n /nRM 10 /n /nRM 0.40 /n /nPRICELESS! =D /n /n
/n /n /n /n /n (10 minutes after the shot) /n /nI'm not feeling it yet, doctor? How long does it take to kick in? /n /nIt's not going to be so fast. /n /nSo we can't IV pethidine huh? /n /n(gives me a strange look) No, it's for IM. /n /nOkay, thank you very, very much doctor. /n (Shakes doctor's hand very vigorously, perhaps too enthusiastic to be unsuspicious) /n /n [photo no longer available] /n /n T+ 0:30: A general feeling of elation and well being. Don't know if it's the pethidine or the euphoria of getting away with a shot of pethidine just like that. /n T+ 0:45: Cigarettes smokes well, like on opiates but it's nowhere near as strong as dihydrocodeine. It does give a rather pleasant high though - kinda chill, but still motivated, I'm typing this as we speak, which I usually don't. /n T+ 1:00: I think this is the peak - it's nothing special - I could compare it to a cross between tramadol and codeine if that makes sense. It feels like tramadol + codeine...and er, it seems a wee bit hallucinatory, I don't know how to explain it, it's like the feeling when I get a hit of LSD and am about to come up and trip, but it never happens. I just mentioned it coz I saw the cigarette smoke drifting off. Perhaps a more apt description would be a very mild case of Ambien induced hallucinations. /n T+ 1:30: Hey, I'm feeling a little of that opiate warmth now. It's nice but too mild for my tolerance. /n /n 50 mg of pethidine wasn't enough to get me off, but I did feel good - which part of it is the phethedine and which part is the elation of pulling this shit off is subjective. I'm full of glee though. :) /n /n
/n /n /n /n IM feels a lot like a combination of tramadol and codeine at doses of 100 mg and 300 mg respectively. There is a general feeling of well being and slight stimulation but with some of the jitteriness of tramadol (very mild). It's more like a cross between tramadol and codeine. The opiate warmth is present but mild. At my tolerance level, 50 mg of pethidine isn't much, but at least I can feel it...and I'm STILL feeling st0ked about pulling this off! =D
